title: The Ring And The Coin Purse
description: Unbeknownst to Earth, an evil race, hungers to rule our world.The mysterious alien beings, Neynrt, own the Ring and the Power within â€¦until Grace, their Princess is lost.To restore Grace and the Power of the Ring, The hunt is on for Aalis.The mysterious eternal being who did the impossible. She became intertwined into an earthling's soul. Finding her isn't easy amongst all the earthly souls, but Neynrt must, as she is the only one who can bring back Grace and the Power of the Ring.Escape into Part I of The Ring and The Coin Purse.A Science Fiction Fantasy Mystery with Magic and Humor and Romance.Free KDP when you buy the Book.
author: Marianne Madson
